channel.title: blog.lmorchard.com
channel.description: It's all spinning wheels & self-doubt until the first pot of coffee.

item.title: In Volvation
item.description: TL;DR: I spent most of the last 18 months in volvation. It would be good to unroll someday.

item.title: Spying on Big Sonic Heaven
item.description: TL;DR: A little over a year ago, one of my favorite radio DJs, Darren Revell, started up a new streaming radio station named Big Sonic Heaven. I got the idea to try building a Spotify playlist collected from the music he plays. My quick & dirty program for doing that turned 1-year-old on April 24 and the playlist has collected over 2000 songs, so far.

item.title: How to build your own Easy-Blog Oven
item.description: TL;DR: I wanted to write more about building my Easy-Blog Oven. I mainly glued together things I already knew, but I think I learned some things and had some surprises anyway.

item.title: Easy-Blog Oven
item.description: TL;DR: I made a new static site generator for my blog. It's not very clever. I've been calling it my "Easy-Blog Oven" and it seems to be working well so far.

item.title: SIO2Pi = Atari 800 + Raspberry Pi
item.description: TL;DR: The first computer I programmed was an Atari 800. I'm using a Raspberry Pi Zero W and a simple serial voltage conversion circuit to load disk images from the internet onto my Atari 800.

item.title: Fun with Themes in Firefox
item.description: TL;DR: Last year, I started work on a new Test Pilot experiment playing with themes in Firefox.

item.title: I Made a WiFi Pumpkin
item.description: TL;DR: I made a wifi pumpkin using an ESP8266 with LED matrix eyes and mouth. I added a web-based remote control for my phone using websockets. It was fun!

item.title: Backyard Pond
item.description: TL;DR: I get conflicted about hosting & running a community site

item.title: Operation: Social Anxiety Edition
item.description: TL;DR: Dealing with social anxiety feels like that old game Operation. BZZT!

item.title: Pages and Pens
item.description: TL;DR: I've been writing a lot and accumulating fancy pens & ink colors.

item.title: Upgrading my Couch PC monitor, v1.2
item.description: TL;DR: My DIY couch PC monitor has been upgraded for a third time.

item.title: Heartbroken
item.description: TL;DR: My heart is broken. Less shitposting. More thinking. Hopefully something productive, soon.

item.title: Firefox Test Pilot: The Flattening
item.description: TL;DR: Firefox Test Pilot is becoming a statically-generated site from content in flat files. We're moving away from Django and PostgreSQL, and it's been a bit of a journey.

item.title: Poking the Mongo on Pico-8
item.description: TL;DR: I started writing a video game for a fantasy console. The future is weird.

item.title: On the Yak Shaving Habits of a Writer
item.description: TL;DR: Writing is apparently so important to me that I procrastinate like crazy rather than risk failing at it.
